snippet.title: SHRAPNEL Game Trailer | First Person Extraction Shooter 🌙
snippet.description:
Official SHRAPNEL video game trailer rendered in Unreal Engine 5 using metahuman technology, this CGI trailer shows views a day in the life of a military extraction force (MEF) operator.  

SHRAPNEL is the 1st blockchain-enabled AAA customizable First Person Shooter (FPS) video game to be owned by players.

📃 Add SHRAPNEL To Your Epic Game Store Wishlist: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/shrapnel-e59542

📢SHRAPNEL UPDATES: https://twitter.com/playSHRAPNEL 🐤 

Neon Machine presents SHRAPNEL, a Jerry O'Flaherty film, Plastic Wax production, music by Jesper Kyd, sound supervision by Alan Rankin/Formosa, written by Mark Long and Jerry O'Flaherty, produced by Mark Long and Adrianna Arriaga, directed by Jerry O'Flaherty. Created in UNREAL ENGINE 5. 

📖 Trailer Chapters 
0:00 - Start of video 
0:15 - Sigma Detected
0:34 - Rabbit Foot Canister
0:45 - Building Falls
0:55 - Fight Begins
0:58 - Neon Sign
1:03 - Enemy Appears
1:22 - Steal The Loot
1:25 - Versus
1:47 - Chibi Operator
1:48 - Shield
1:59 - Extraction
2:08 - Incoming
2:22 - Your Turn
2:33 - Shrapnel

Learn More About SHRAPNEL: 
- Whitepaper: https://www.shrapnel.com/Shrapnel-White-Paper.pdf 
- Medium: https://medium.com/@playSHRAPNEL 
- Join the Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/shrapnel (☠, ☠) 

🌊 Discover the SHRAPNEL Operators Collection on OpenSea: https://opensea.io/collection/shrapnel-operators-collection 

🔴SUBSCRIBE ▸ https://www.youtube.com/playSHRAPNEL 

⚒ JOIN OUR SQUAD: https://www.shrapnel.com/careers 

🎥 Shrapnel CGI Trailer Crew: 
Director: Jerry O'Flaherty 📢 
Music: Jesper Kyd 🎵 
Sound Supervision: Alan Rakin/Formosa 🔊 
Film Studio: Plastic Wax 🎬 
Producers: Mark Long and Adrianna Arriaga 😎 

#Play2Own #PlayShrapnel #FPS #Gaming
